arts.ttl: Galatasaray Watching Pellegrini Struggles at Roma
arts.sum: Lorenzo Pellegrini and Roma are about to hit a crossroads, as there are just 18 months left on his contract. The Giallorossi want their captain to react to his present difficulties before starting to discuss an extension. The post Galatasaray Watching Pellegrini Struggles at Roma appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
